mapper.select: SELECT li.id, li.label_name, li.label_describe, li.label_cover, li.follow_number, li.article_number, uf.create_time FROM b_user_follow AS uf LEFT JOIN b_label_info AS li ON uf.target_id = li.id WHERE uf.type = #{type} AND uf.state = 0 and uf.uid = #{uid}

SELECT um.uuid, um.nickname, um.avatar, um.location, um.remark, um.occupation, um.user_type, uf.create_time FROM b_user_follow AS uf LEFT JOIN b_user_main AS um ON uf.target_id = um.uuid WHERE uf.type = #{type} AND uf.state = 0 and uf.uid = #{uid}
SELECT uid as uuid, count(uid) as followCount FROM `b_user_follow` where state = 0 and type = 1 GROUP BY uid
SELECT target_id as targetId, count(target_id) as `sum` FROM `b_user_follow` where state = 0 and type = 2 GROUP BY target_id
